clinical_study.brief_title: CERAMENT™| Bone Void Filler Device Registry
clinical_study.official_title: CERAMENT™| Bone Void Filler Device Registry

brief_summary.textblock: A device registry to compile data on the performance of CERAMENT BONE VOID FILLER in normal use.

primary_outcome.measure: Unexpected device performance will be collected as they occur at time of surgery and on an ongoing basis thereafter, with formal scheduled review at 12 and 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Unexpected device performance will be collected as they occur at time of surgery and on an ongoing basis thereafter, with formal scheduled review at 12 and 24 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Radiological assessment at 6 and 12 months. Objective assessment of regeneration
Radiological assessment at 6 and 12 months. Objective assessment of regeneration

intervention.description: CERAMENT BONE VOID FILLER is a synthetic biphasic bone graft substitute.

study_pop.textblock: The racial, gender, and ethnic characteristics of the individuals approached for participation in this Observational Registry Study shall reflect the demographics of patients that would ordinarily received CERAMENT BVF for the treatment of their condition at the designated investigative centers. No individuals shall be excluded from participation in the Observational Registry Study based on race, nationality, ethnicity, gender or sexuality.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 years and over (on the day of surgery)
- Receive CERAMENT BVF as a component of their treatment at a participating, contracted center or healthcare provider, in accordance with the IFU for the implanted product
- In receipt of patient information leaflet and have signed appropriately designed informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any exclusion criteria as per IFU for CERAMENT BVF
- Any off-label use
